name.ja: <ruby>蒼<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>救<rt>きゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>使<rt>し</rt></ruby> ソレイル

requirement.en: Reveal 1 Warrior Type monster in your hand:

effect.en: This card's name becomes "Lua the Skysavior Angel" this turn. Then, excavate the top 4 cards of your Deck. You can add 1 excavated "Fusion" to your hand. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of the Deck in any order.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
